parameters.text:
=
I want a prompt that generates a match score between my own skillset / job preferences and an Upwork job.

In the prompt, I'll provide information about my skillset and job preferences.

Then the user will provide an Upwork job with this shape:
{
  "jobName": "AI Chatbot for Car Dealerships",
  "jobType": "hourly",
  "price": "$15 - $50",
  "jobDetailUrl": "https://www.upwork.com/jobs/~021942237848823037012?link=ews%7Ej0b8kfrkscc=53KkV4bz0UCt",
  "descriptionSnippet": "We are seeking a developer or team to build an AI-powered tool with the following capabilities: - Interacts with user and main objective is to SELL THE CAR.",
  "country": "United States",
  "paymentVerified": true,
  "clientRating": 4.65,
  "amountSpent": "$491K spent",
  "tags": [
    "Data Scraping",
    "API Integration",
    "Chatbot Development"
  ],
  "postedAt": "2025-07-07 11:02",
  "experienceLevel": "Expert"
}
Note that the description is just a snippet, not the full description, so we‚Äôre working with limited information here.
The important fields to take into account are the job name, description snippet, tags.
The secondary fields are the experienceLevel.
It should also take into account any preferences that will be shared like job types and payment amounts.

The output should be a match score between 1‚Äì10, with 10 being high confidence that this is a great job match for me, and 1 being high confidence that this is a poor match for me.

<my_profile>
I help businesses eliminate manual work through custom AI workflows and automation systems.

What I Do:
- Build custom AI workflows that save hours of manual work daily
- Automate repetitive business processes (sales, marketing, operations)
- Integrate AI systems with existing tech stacks
- Create scalable solutions that grow with your business  I‚Äôm an expert with n8n, make.com, zapier, and most other AI automation tools.

I have a slight preference for hourly projects with a rate about $30/hour.
</my_profile>

<job>
{{ $json.output.jobType }}
</job>
